00029 class content
00030 {
00031     public $strip_html = false;
00032     public $allowed_tags = null;
00033 
00034     public function get($obj_db, $str_path = '')
00035     {
00036         $_path = strtolower(trim($str_path));
00037         if (!$_path) {
00038             return;
00039         }
00040 
00041         if (preg_match('@^admin.+@i', $_path)) {
00042             $_unauthorized = !isset($_SESSION['uid']) AND !isset($_SESSION['uname']) AND !isset($_SESSION['realname']);
00043             if ($_unauthorized) {
00044                 return;
00045             }
00046         }
00047         // query content
00048         $_content_q = $obj_db->query('SELECT * FROM content WHERE content_path=\''.($obj_db->escape_string($_path)).'\'');
00049         // get content data
00050         $_content_d = $_content_q->fetch_assoc();
00051         if (!$_content_d['content_title'] OR !$_content_d['content_path']) {
00052             return false;
00053         } else {
00054             $_content['Title'] = $_content_d['content_title'];
00055             $_content['Path'] = $_content_d['content_path'];
00056             $_content['Content'] = $_content_d['content_desc'];
00057             // strip html
00058             if ($this->strip_html) {
00059                 $_content['Content'] = strip_tags($_content['Content'], $this->allowed_tags);
00060             }
00061 
00062             return $_content;
00063         }
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 ?>
